tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hydropower_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  completion_date DATE,
  total_cost DECIMAL,
  budgeted_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE HydropowerProjects (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   project_name TEXT,
   location TEXT,
   budget DECIMAL,
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CostAnalysis (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   project_id INT,
   expense_type TEXT,
   amount DECIMAL,
   date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES HydropowerProjects(id)
);

CREATE TABLE hydropower_projects (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  estimated_budget DECIMAL(15, 2),
  actual_cost DECIMAL(15, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE hydropower_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10,2),
    cost_estimate DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE project_expenses (
    expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    expense_date DATE,
    expense_description TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE project_revenues (
    revenue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    revenue_date DATE,
    revenue_description TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE project_personnel (
    personnel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    personnel_name VARCHAR(255),
    job_title VARCHAR(255),
    salary DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE hydropower_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
    cost_analysis DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE project_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    estimated_hours INT,
    actual_hours INT
)

CREATE TABLE expenses (
    expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    expense_date DATE,
    expense_description TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE staff (
    staff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE project_files (
    file_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    file_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_type VARCHAR(50),
    file_size INT
)
